text:
Looking at these historical letter images, I can identify the following information:

From the letterhead and content, I can see:
- The letter is from "Basler Rheinschiffahrt-Aktiengesellschaft" (Basel Rhine Shipping Corporation)
- The date shown is "Basel, den 4. April 1928"
- The letter is addressed to "Basler Personenschiffahrtsgesellschaft, Basel"
- The letter is signed at the bottom of page 2, with what appears to be signatures from "BASLER RHEINSCHIFFAHRT-AKTIENGESELLSCHAFT"

There is no specific letter title mentioned in the document.
